column1: biking and fishing with my best friend today 💞 love is just another word for fascination yoooo we're bringing the tandem bike backkkkk 🚴🚴 anyone wanna go to the lake with chloë and me tomorrow? thanks (: i forgot to eat 😊😊 🌲🎨 thanks! i'm still working on it! (: 💫🎨 i'm always home alone on the weekends someone come over and let me paint on them everyone at my testing center is grumpy af good morning 💖 like 85% mcdonald's, 13% stupid ideas and 2% slut. i'm not the sharpest 😕 did you watch the video i posted? i tried to jump from the top of the stairs and close the door with my feet 😭 "tripped on a fuckboys bullshit" idk how i'm gonna explain this when my parents get home i think i broke my ankle truu i hate my self as someone whom is 1daf i can say he is not going to leave there's no one direction with out zayn #js obsessed with this drawing for obvious reasons is anyone else testing at cal state east bay tomorrow? molly did you buy tickets or parking passes me at church i guess if your opinion on how much i post on instagram mattered it would be your account and not mine. (: i need taco bell and a nap when your house catches on fire but got jokes when you see a cute guy but he has a girlfriwnd keani lasagna when the bae-seball team is in uniform starbs changed my name i guess thanks fam my mom made me breakfast and a smoothie 😊 "i'd be sweet if you'd make me a happy man at prom" then give me sweet tea and a happy meal. okay. thanks. ask me to prom with sweet tea and mcnuggets lololololol ok i'm not one to accept an apology just because it's given really knows how to treat a date if u take her to prom 😂 oh also i just got into a azusa pacific university and a yearly renewable scholarship for $10,000 if you want a real gem for prom that can really dance take my girl rt when he says he's looking for a prom date chloës mom makes the best dinner 😊 i'm going to chloes house to eat dinner and meet her brothers, but mostly just to eat dinner "the ones who can't be, make out with, or avoid being made fun of by the beautiful ones are usually the heroes" rt "sebastian and quincy are home" "oh that's wonderful can i come over for a family dinner?" turning the heads of your exes into earrings > when he can catch the rebound 🏀 this old dirty mattress reminds me of you we're probably never gonna use this stuff in "real life" but i'd rather know it and never use it than be ignorant. i finished my eggs oh god 😂😂😂😂 omw to school! i tried to make a chloe easter egg and i can't stop laughing at how fugly it is 😂 it's not even april and i'm making easter eggs is my eyebrow goals af i'll make a 4.0 before i make curfew rt 360 with the wrist boi look at duh flick of the wrist #stopbitching idk what i like about fun works more, the glorified lawn mowers or all the 12 year olds "listen here fuck boy, you ain't even old enough to be a fuck boy" #priorities spittin game at i asked my mom why her flip flops are sticky and she goes "oh i wore them to the bar last night" i forgot how hot modesto gets... someone give me shorts 😭 when my teachers call on me in class it's so precious when little kids don't know how to use their hands so they'll use their entire palm to push their hair out of their face rt i think 16 year old girls are the meanest people on this planet it's pi day i'm in modesto! oops i'd rather enjoy the view while it lasts than focus on the fact that i'm probably lost. rt cute best friend night since we are single af this is the first time chloe and i have hung out outside of school since new years. ending out night on the town just ran into oomf at todos you'd be really pretty if you weren't so ugly the bench looks different today, did you guys get a hair cut? you know you're running late when your window looks like this you're not allowed to say you're 100% against animal cruelty if you wear ugs or mac stupid fucktwats when oomf looks like a porn star 😂 my camera looks like it went swimming with its eyes open if you guys like they're doing a benefit for my camp. it'd mean a lot if you bought tickets to the show i'm already getting real tired of this blonde in my hair. idk if i should dye it brown or just out color on it. you're just not fierce enough this sis the first time we've seen each other all day and we're matching i just spent 30 minutes deciding if i should wear my grey senior hoodie or my grey disney hoodie i haven't had a phone charger since saturday. i've just been taking everyone else's. rt iggy azalea really let me down by postponing her tour. i was weeks away from seeing nick jonas and she took tha… you don't want me you just want your ex to see "girls like to gossip about flowers and stuff" how come the teachers can park in our parking lot but we can't park in theirs? i love wearing pajamas to school psa: last minute pajama day sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite ma'am, i'm not sure if you're aware but your son is a fuck boy.   here i was thinking this was about me. #awk daijalyn yes i do, it's justgetmorecats rt in 20 years i won't remember today when did it ever become okay to make someone feel bad about how much they eat? i don't know how anyone can sit there and make someone feel so bad about how much they eat until the point of tears every single night my parents act like going to school isn't stressful or hard but they can't even help me with my homework. i told the class "everyone pose like fuck boys" haha thanks for leaving your mcdonald's in the back of my car and french fries all over my seats. even tho i don't let people eat in my car rt when your whole class on fleek i thought i was running early till the radio said it was day light savings and i realized it was 8 not 7 i forgot my locker combination yea i went to bed hella early 😂 sweet dreams & goodnight everyone you said you wanted to post a pic of us on ig and now you have one 💕 why is my boss so fierce ? sitting on the steps of a museum dressed for a benefit eating mcdonalds b/c they suck maybe instead of coming out with a new iphone every other month apple should create a charger that last longer than a week having a cup of yogurt in the mornings is easily my favorite part of the day waking up to the sun is so much better than waking up to an alarm i'll buy a homeless person a full on meal, no hesitation. but don't come up to me in true religion jeans & brand new nikes asking for money. more like when he begs for nudes then spreads them 😏😂 caption: when you see someone flirtin' with bae the selfie we took when we were setting up the selfie stick 😂 i love my friends in every city i've lived in, but when i look back on my life, i am so much happier out here. my family hates me you might be at banquet watching popular kids get awards, but i got a selfie stick, so who's the real winner? guess what i bought?!? "my hang out is my bed" - rt american horror story: i'm in love with a fuckboy mcexquisite when you got an open 6th but your bestfriend doesn't i have a meeting with the administrators tomorrow & have to be at school at 7:30 😭 it takes me 30 minutes just to drive to school i think it's funny that sdsu denied me but ucsd offered me exclusively a summer internship i was loading my groceries into my car& this homeless man rode over on his bike & helped me & said i was the prettiest lady in the lot ☺️ i don't really have a plan, i kinda just grabbed everything can you guys stop vandalizing the bathrooms? some of us actually have to pee during school. 50 shades of bad editing and missing details that are important to the plot. i'm not mad, i'm disappointed. anastasia is such an underrated disney movie everyone needs a molly in their life to send them cute morning texts 💖 there are many things that i would like to say to you but i don't know how perks of having chloe as a bestfriend is she gives the best presents ☕️💫 no! i was washing my brushes and i was air drying and it flew off... what i love most about the river is, you can't step in the same river twice, the waters always changing, always flowing why do bad things happen to good people? mood i have the best bestfriend in the world😍☕️ i'm so tired why aren't you in bed? no, paris and nicole are about to go work on a farm i'm still awake watching paris and nicole on simple life i've got granola and tea i forgot to take my medicine this morning so my body's all out of whack and i'm wide awake would it be weird if i bought this empty cereal box on ebay? 😂 can i put snspchat artist on my résumé? in trouble for calling my parents lame b/c they told me to make my own dinner & as soon as i did they made everyone else something nicer i wanna go to briones next weekend a milkshake would be so great right now a little obsessed with flowers 😍 proud of my sis 👍 i just saw the cutest horse and she nuzzled her head into my chest 😍 this ladies just been standing here since we sat down to eat our lunch 😂 look at my 11 year old sister powering up the mountain with me! when you see your crush flirting with someone else now my cat is doing it tf damn right i did when ur friends are all hanging out and posting pics but they didn't invite you rt random text from 😂😂😂 this school gets me always all over those top of the mountain selfies 💁 catch me somewhere on the mt diablo... again rt i don't get how guys are so quick to expose a girl's nudes or whatever, but they forget that they like begged for them. smh… at least boys have changed changed in 65 years favorite movie 😍 trying to make it to the bank and not spend my money before i get there is harder than making money still can't believe i burnt my chicken nuggets face paint on fleek boss said "there's drinks outside if you get thirsty" they must be talking about that one juice box at the bottom i'm having a bad feeling about tonight this idiot just swerved into my lane during a left turn then stopped in the middle of the rode my purse just broke and i closed my car door on my hair. what happen to "i'm quitting after this" 😂😏 figured it out this is a much needed car wash there are people that are dying and you're still talking about that ugly dress our convos are 99% me and 1% her it's been so long i don't even remember what my house in modesto looks like i changed my senior quote and honestly i don't regret it there's no reason the alphabet needs to be in order. i wish i could just hear from the last two colleges i applied to already. i asked my mom what color she thought the dress was and she said ugly. rt highlight of my day: when travis told ms. hillman's assistant teacher to get her teaching credential before telling us w… what's this dress? i'm confused? you know, it was a long time ago... i can't remember 102 i'll expect you at my locker 12:05 sharp chloe won't be at school tomorrow, i'm holding auditions for a new bestfriend at lunch i had bigger boobs at 3 than i do at 17
